articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: Google becomes the latest tech giant to slow hiring - CNN
articles.description: Google plans to slow its pace of hiring for the remainder of the year in the latest sign of tech companies rethinking staffing amid a market downturn that has hit Silicon Valley particularly hard.
